import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={currentTitle:'Indielog'};export var pageTitleReducer=createSlice({name:"pageTitle",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setCurrentTitle:function setCurrentTitle(state,action){state.currentTitle=action.payload;}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var setCurrentTitle=pageTitleReducer.actions.setCurrentTitle;export{setCurrentTitle};export default pageTitleReducer.reducer;
